description: 共同科英文（一）課程為一學年課程，每學期兩學分，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此目標，本課程要求教師盡量用英語上課，努力營造一個豐富的英語環境，讓學生不但有充分機會以英語參與課堂活動，且樂於使用英語與同學及老師溝通。
goals: 增進學生英語溝通表達能力
透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神
透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野
透過課堂討論培養批判精神
提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣
syllabus:
**Freshmen English (High-Int.)**

**Course description**

This course is designed to support students in their use of English language in academic context. Through close study of text materials, engagement in production activities, and self-paced reading practice (Scholastic Literacy Pro), students are expected to acquire communication strategies for reading, listening, speaking and writing, develop fluency and autonomy, and enhance their critical thinking skill.

**Course requirements**

Midterm (25%) & Final (25%)

Assignments (30%)

Include online reading, short speech, and Lexile pre-test/book summary

Attendance & Participation (20%)

Include in-class activities, Quality Talk (QT) session

**Course schedule** **(16 + 2 sessions)**

Week 1 – Introduction and preliminaries

Week 2 & 3 – Unit 1 reading + exercises

Week 4 & 5 – Unit 2 reading + exercises

Week 6 – Class activity

Week 7 – Group presentation

Week 8 – Midterm

Week 9 & 10 – Unit 3 reading + exercises

Week 11 & 12 – Unit 4 reading + exercises

Week 13 – Short speech

Week 14 – Class activity

Week 15 – No class (holiday)

Week 16 – Final

\*Flexible sessions: Scholastic online reading; Moodle assignment
